metadata.title: CVE-2024-1493 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 9.2 prior to 16.11.5, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, and startingfrom 17.1 prior to 17.1.1, with the processing logic for generating link independency files can lead to a regular  expression DoS attack on the server

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
